name: Ampharos
description: Its tail shines bright and strong. It has been prized since long ago as a beacon for sailors.

attacks.name: Thunder Shock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Searchlight Tail
attacks.effect: Your opponent reveals their hand. If you find any Energy cards there, this attack does 90 more damage.
